      public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture resize(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, float scaleXY)
      Resizes the given texture to the given scaler using a nearest neighbour algorithm.

    • resize

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture resize(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, float scaleX, float scaleY)
      Resizes the given texture to the given scalers using a nearest neighbour algorithm.
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture to resize.
      scaleX - The scale factor in the x axis.
      scaleY - The scale factor in the y axis.
      Returns:
      The resized texture.
